bibl.title: The Age of the Successors and the Creation of the Hellenistic Kingdoms (323-276 B.C.)
bibl.note: tabl., figg., pll. n./bl. et coul.

Pp. ix: H.H. & A.M., Preface; - 1-6: H.H. & A.M., Introduction. New Perspectives on the age of the successors. - 24 contributions. All but two of the articles originated in the International Conference 'The Age of the Successors (323-276 B.C.)' that was held in Leuven and Brussels from 25 to 27 September 2008. - Pp. 631-690: Bibliography; - 691-707: Index locorum; - 709-733: General Index.
bibl.seg: Hans Hauben & Alexander Meeus (edd.), The Age of the Successors and the Creation of the Hellenistic Kingdoms (323-276 B.C.) = Studia Hellenistica. 53.
Leuven, Peeters, 2014, 8°, xvi-733 pp., tabl., figg., pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-90-429-2958-6. €105.

Pp. ix: H.H. & A.M., Preface; - 1-6: H.H. & A.M., Introduction. New Perspectives on the age of the successors. - 24 contributions. All but two of the articles originated in the International Conference 'The Age of the Successors (323-276 B.C.)' that was held in Leuven and Brussels from 25 to 27 September 2008. - Pp. 631-690: Bibliography; - 691-707: Index locorum; - 709-733: General Index.
